scenario_text.value: You monster! What did you do with Miu?!
I keep trying to tell you, I don’t know—

Cut the crap! Admit it! You kidnapped her,
didn’t you?!
Kaito, stop! What is wrong with you?!
There’s no need to resort to violence!
Let go of me! She took her! She took Miu!
Or even if she didn’t, she knows something!
Enough! You need to calm down!
Kaito! There’s no need to hurt anyone! Relax!
Hmph, fine. I’ll stop. Let go of me.

Look, I know I don’t have proof, but if she
knows what happened to Miu, I wanna hear it.
